about_the_game:
A place beyond extinction. A wonderland of life and evolution awaits. Enjoy!



Kanako Ito
Celebrating her 20th year as a singer, the diva still goes on strong, singing various Game, Anime theme songs.
"Go to any and every occasion that calls upon me" as her motto, she rides the wind with her voice as her wings.

Kazuhiro Watanabe
A singer song-writer with a fierce heart driven voice.
Alongside his singer persona, he also works as a song-writer, Lyricist for various Game, Anime material.
Writes Japanese and English lyrics both fluently.
Recently working hard on YouTube content releases.

STELLA LEE JONES
A progressive rock band founded in 2009 by former FLAT122 member, Satoshi Hirata.
Performing and recording actively in the Tokyo metropolitan area.
One of the most anticipated bands of the contemporary construct prog-rock scene in Japan,
winning critical acclaim with the 1st album "A FLOATING PLACE" released on Dec. 28th, 2011.

ZIZZ STUDIO
A music production company lead by Toshimichi Isoe.
Produces music for various genres from Anime, Games, Cinema, Theatre, etc..
Also has solid experience in artist production operation.
Has many contacts with a wide array of artists and genres such as band sounds, European classical music, Japanese domestic music, etc..
Specializes in featuring organic musical instruments in the ensemble.
Takes pride in recreating the recorded sound in a live environment.
